tips: Avoid daily sulfates; use gentle sulfate-free cleansers.
Use weekly protein masks to reinforce the hair cortex.
Always seal wet hair with an oil to lock moisture.
Use warm water or steam to help product penetration.
Use lighter oils (jojoba, argan) and avoid heavy butters daily.
Clarify every 2–3 weeks if product buildup appears.

growth.notes: Focus on scalp circulation and protecting hair from mechanical stress.

repair.notes: Introduce protein treatments but monitor for brittleness.

shine.notes: Seal cuticle and avoid heavy oils before styling.

protein_mask_weekly.name: Weekly protein mask
protein_mask_weekly.instructions: Apply to lengths after shampoo, leave 10–20 minutes, rinse with cool water.

scalp_massage.name: Scalp massage (3x/week)
scalp_massage.instructions: Massage scalp 2–5 minutes using fingertips or a scalp brush.

cold_rinse.name: Cold water rinse
cold_rinse.instructions: Rinse hair with cool water to smooth the cuticle after conditioning.

weekly_nutrient_mask.name: Weekly nutrient mask
weekly_nutrient_mask.instructions: Apply a nutrient-rich mask once per week for 10–20 minutes.

gentle_shampoo.name: Gentle sulfate-free shampoo
gentle_shampoo.instructions: Use gentle cleanser 1–3x per week depending on scalp oiliness.

light_serum_post_style.name: Light finishing serum
light_serum_post_style.instructions: Apply 1–2 drops to ends after styling for shine, avoid roots.

default_growth.title: 4-week Growth Starter
default_growth.notes: Stick to these actions and report weekly during check-ins.
